title: Tommyhoi Peak
description:
(and Yellow Aster Butte)

September, 2004

Theron and I hiked up Tomyhoi and Yellow Aster Butte in good weather Sunday. Theron's more detailed report is here.




Canadian and American Border Peaks.



Lovely hillocks near Tomyhoi Peak.



Michael on Tomyhoi Peak.



Theron crossing a gable.



Theron scrambling to the summit.



Tarns with Mt. Shuksan in the background.



Theron and Mt. Shuksan.



Yellow Aster Butte.



Looking south from Yellow Aster Butte's summit.
